results.title: Weight and circuit training (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Brian Hannant, Bruce Moir, Nicholas Cockram and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode no. 3 of Series “Conditioning for Sport”
Describes many specific exercises and training and condition techniques necessary for those interested in weight training. Weight training is a proven method for athletes to develop strength, power and muscular endurance, so it differs from weight lifting which emphasises strength and firm body building.

results.title: General principles
results.creator_credit: Brian Hannant, Nicholas Cockram, Slater Sound Studios and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Conditioning for Sport”.
Gives an insight into some of the specific exercises and conditioning techniques necessary for the athlete to achieve his best. Illustrates various sports with particular emphasis on track and field events.

group_works.title: The 24 hour world
group_works.creator_credit: John Costello, Terry Hughes and London Television Service

results.title: The 24 hour world
results.creator_credit: John Costello, Terry Hughes and London Television Service
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Concorde”.
Portrays the world’s most interesting civil aircraft today - concorde - and includes some exciting shots of the aircraft in flight filmed with the R.A.F.’s Red Arrows. Sequences include: the development of civil aviation; evolution of Concorde; follow through of an actual test flight and coverage of Concord’s 1972 World Trip, via Iran, India, Singapore, Japan, to Australia

results.title: The Great Collaboration
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Concorde”.
Surveys the scientific and technical research that went into the English/French co-production of the supersonic jet, Concorde.

results.title: The Earthshrinker
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Concorde”.
Illustrates the advantages of the Concorde for world travel. Shows a brief history of the plane and the new technology involved.
